@graph.caption: Red Beet, Pear, Minneola orange and Apple Smoothie served in a martini glass

@graph.name: Red Beet, Pear, Minneola orange and Apple Smoothie. vegan, glutenfree - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: My Red Beet, Pear, Minneola orange and Apple Smoothie is another way to use up the Seasonal fruits and veggies. A pretty colored smoothie.

itemListElement.name: Red Beet, Pear, Minneola orange and Apple Smoothie. vegan, glutenfree

@graph.name: Red Beet, Pear, Minneola orange and Apple Smoothie
@graph.description: Seasonal fruits and veggies. A pretty colored smoothie. Lightly cooked and spiced!
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint  (or 1 tablespoon cilantro or any herb of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or deep pan, add water, red Beet, Apple and orange juice
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or deep pan, add water, red Beet, Apple and orange juice

recipeInstructions.text: Add salt, rock salt, black pepper, Sugar, chopped fresh mint
recipeInstructions.name: Add salt, rock salt, black pepper, Sugar, chopped fresh mint

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 1 whistle or cook covered for 10-15 minutes on low-medium heat until most fruit is tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 1 whistle or cook covered for 10-15 minutes on low-medium heat until most fruit is tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool and blend to a puree. Taste and adjust water consistency, salt, sugar. Garnish with black pepper, cumin powder or dried herbs. drink! Of course, you can spike it with your favorite liquor in the evening.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool and blend to a puree. Taste and adjust water consistency, salt, sugar. Garnish with black pepper, cumin powder or dried herbs. drink! Of course, you can spike it with your favorite liquor in the evening.
